unnormalised: **Manufacturing & Supply Chain: Inventory Forecasting Gets a Boost in Nashik**
normalised: **Manufacturing and Supply Chain: Inventory Forecasting Gets a Boost in Nashik**

unnormalised: Nashik, Maharashtra - 25/10/2024 - Local manufacturers are increasingly adopting sophisticated inventory forecasting techniques to optimize operations and minimize waste, particularly during the Diwali season. A recent workshop conducted by the National Institute of Industrial Engineering (NITIE) Mumbai, held on 18/10/2024, saw participation from over 50 SMEs based in the region.
normalised: Nashik, Maharashtra - twenty fifth october two thousand and twenty four - Local manufacturers are increasingly adopting sophisticated inventory forecasting techniques to optimize operations and minimize waste, particularly during the Diwali season. A recent workshop conducted by the N I T I E Mumbai, held on eighteenth october two thousand and twenty four, saw participation from over fifty S M Es based in the region.

unnormalised: "Predicting demand accurately is crucial, especially for perishable goods and seasonal items like sweets and diyas," said Mr. Sharma, owner of Sharma Sweets, a popular confectionary in Nashik. "The NITIE workshop helped us understand advanced algorithms that can factor in local festivals and historical sales data."

unnormalised: Accurate forecasting helps avoid stockouts and reduces the need for distress sales on unsold inventory after festivals like Diwali. Firms using these tools are reporting potential savings of up to 15% by minimizing storage costs and waste. A follow-up session is scheduled for 10:00 hrs on 01/11/2024 to delve deeper into practical applications and case studies relevant to the Indian market. Improved forecasting also promises faster delivery times for retailers, enhancing customer satisfaction.
